text: The Sachin State (; ) was a princely state in India during the British Raj.Ian Copland, The Princes of India in the Endgame of Empire, 1917-1947 (Cambridge; New York: Cambridge University Press, 1997), pp. 32â€“33 The ruler of Sachin held the title of Nawab. == References == ==Other websites== * *Early Indian Movies Category:Indian princely states
title: Sachin (princely state)
